content.prompt: Topic: Working in pairs helps students learn better at school.
content.instructions: You have 2 minutes to prepare. Use the mind map below to organise your ideas, then speak for 3-4 minutes.
mindMapNodes: Gives students the opportunity to learn from others
Improves students' social skills and interaction
followUpQuestions: In what situations should pair work be used at school, and why?
What are some possible disadvantages of working in pairs?
